name: HashKey Group
fullText:
🇻🇳 Vietnam is rising fast in crypto — with young users, top dev talent, and clear regulation leading the way.

HashKey Group sees Vietnam as the next crypto frontier — and we are proud to support its growth with our global experience.

📖 Read more https://t.co/shUxySuFVt

name: Monad 华语社群
fullText:
💫Monad Blitz 杭州站圆满收官💫

Blitz 是一个为期一天的黑客松，开发人员可以在其中了解到 Monad 并行 EVM 带来的极致性能与创新可能，并在测试网上发布。

12 小时、80+开发人员、20个专案已构建。

非常感谢 @OpenBuildxyz 协办使这次活动取得成功。 https://t.co/YIyyvlQxQE
